page.text: de Vence MAGAZINE GUIDE TO VENCE Hotels QUICKGUIDE

Introduction Whether you are searching for superior comfort or a budget “bed and breakfast” you will find accomodation to suit your pocket and your style. Rooms are at a premium, especially during the summer months, so early booking is advised. This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment. To download the newest version of our Magazine click on this icon. Hotels Guest Houses Camping Hotels QUICKGUIDE Click here to return to Vence Magazine

Hotel MiramarHHH An ancient manor, transformed into a charming provinçal hotel with a spacious shaded garden with a stunning panoramic view. A very relaxing place at 5 minutes walk from the town center. Parking - Swimming Pool. 167 avenue Bougearel- 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 20 22 E-Mail: contact@hotel-miramar-vence.com www.hotel-miramar-vence.com 167 avenue Bougearel- 06140 Vence - Google Maps https://maps.google.com/maps Address 167 Avenue Joseph Bougearel 06140 Vence, France

Hotel CantemerleHHHH A. Hôtel Spa & Restaurant Cantemerle 258, chemin Cantemerle, 06140 Vence ​ 04 93 58 08 18 ​ 3 avis €€€ Prix convertis selon le taux de change actuel - Clause de non- responsabilité Discover the stunning Hôtel & Spa Cantemerle with its panoramic view to the Mediterranean See. Enjoy this magical place with its Spa, heated indoor swimming pool, hamman and fitness center. 258 chemin Cantemerle - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 08 18 E-Mail: info@hotelcantemerle.com www.hotelcantemerle.com 258 chemin cantemerle, vence, france

A. AubergedesSeigneurs 1 Rue du Docteur Binet, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 58 04 24 ​ 1 avis B. L'aubergeDesSeigneurs Place du Frêne., Vence, 06140, 06140, France ​ +33 4 93 58 04 24 ​ Auberge des Seigneurs, à proximité de Rue du Docteur Binet, 06140 Vence, France Auberge des Seigneurs The oldest inn in Vence offers 6 confortable bedrooms named after famous painters. The restaurant is a must with its inventive cooking from fresh local products. The dining room is unique with meat cooked in the fireplace. 1 rue Docteur Binet - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 04 24 E-Mail: www.auberge-seigneurs.com

Hotel DianaHHH Vence - Google Maps Address 79 Avenue des Poilus 06140 Vence, France https://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&geo... Hôtel de charme situé à deux pas du centre historique de Vence où vous y découvrirez un art de vivre, des musées et galeries d ́art, des restaurants avec une cuisine provençale typique, un festival renommé: les nuits du sud. 79 avenue des Poilus - 06140 Vence Téléphone:+33(0)493582858•Fax0493246406 E-Mail: contact@hotel-diana.fr www.hotel-diana.fr

539 avenue Emile Hugues- 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04.93.58.06.16 • Fax: 04.93.24.04.21 E-Mail: mas@azurline.com www.masdevence.azurline.com Mas de Vence 539 Avenue Emile Hugues, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps Adresse 539 Avenue Emile Hugues 06140 Vence, France

Hotel RoseraieHHH A. Hôtel Spa & Restaurant Cantemerle 258, chemin Cantemerle, 06140 Vence ​ 04 93 58 08 18 ​ 3 avis €€€ Prix convertis selon le taux de change actuel - Clause de non- responsabilité A charming small hotel at 400m from town center. An authentic XIXth century inn with provencal colors. Swimming pool, shady terrace, parking, garden with luxuriant vegetation, garden bar, free wifi access and conference room. 128 Avenue Henri Giraud - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 02 20 E-Mail: accueil@villaroseraie.com www.villaroseraie.com 258 chemin cantemerle, vence, france

Situated at the edge of Vence and St. Paul de Vence, Tom and Ruth welcome you to their hotel with its modern rooms decorated in the colours of Provence. All the rooms are en-suite with bath or shower and fully equipped with IT. Swimming pool and shady terrace for the summer. 2340, route de Cagnes- 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 4 93 58 11 27 E-Mail: hotelcayrons@orange.fr http://www.hotelcayrons.fr Hotel des Cayrons 2340, route de Cagnes- 06140 Vence - Google Maps Adresse 2340 Route de Cagnes 06140 Vence, France
Click here to return to Vence Magazine Hotels QUICKGUIDE This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment. To download the newest version of our Magazine click on this icon.

All about the icons Shopping No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. Hotels and Other Accomodation If you are searching for superior comfort or a budget “bed and breakfast” you will find an accomodation to suit you here. Restaurants FASHION HOTELS SOUVENIRS DELICATESSEN GUEST HOUSES CAMPING Vence’s restaurants cater for every taste and pocket - from inexpensive “plat du jour” of local produce to exotic flavours from other lands or gourmet adventures. Cafes Vence’s many cafes are ideal places to relax and watch the world go by, to meet and chat to residents or other tourists, or plan your next excursion. Real Estate Agents See how real people live on the Côte d’Azur by visiting sales properties with a choice of Real Estate Agents. Perhaps your visit will prove a good financial investment. Services Banks, pharmacies, and if you can’t find what you’re looking for, it is probably listed here. Galleries SERVICES FINANCE TAKE-AWAY The “City of Arts” is home to many galleries. Each has its own theme, special artist or style of work. Some are hidden in interesting untravelled corners of the city. Beauty Whether tempted to try a new look or merely smartening up for a special evening out, Vence’s beauty parlours and hairdressers are at your service. Places Museums, Parks, Miscellaneous sites worth seeing...
MAGAZINE CLICK TOWATCH de Vence GUIDE TO VENCE Contact info@worldondvd.com 17, Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France Siret No 532 475 688 00018 MAGAZINE DE VENCE SPRING 2013
